snippet: A new report from the United Nations shows the devastating effect of Senate Republicans who blocked ratification of a treaty to help disabled people around the world.
abstract: Editorial highlights United Nations report on state of the world's children, which underscores moral bankruptcy of Senate Republicans who blocked ratification of treaty to help disabled people around the world.
lead_paragraph: A new report from the United Nations shows the devastating effect of Senate Republicans who blocked ratification of a treaty to help disabled people around the world.
